name: Bolstering Darkness
description: Conjure a ring of shadow, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies by 70% and granting you and your allies Major Protection while inside the ring and even after leaving it, reducing your damage taken by 10%.  Allies in the area can activate the Hidden Refresh synergy, granting them invisibility, increasing their Movement Speed by 70%, and healing them for 9110 Health over 4 seconds.
effectLines: Major Protection remains on any friendly targets who pass through the area, persisting until the ability ends regardless of where they go.
